title.zh-CN: 抑郁焦虑综合测评【学术专业版】

disclaimer.zh-CN: 本报告结果基于您的自评数据生成，仅供自我探索与心理健康筛查参考，不可作为医疗诊断证明。如有明显不适，请及时前往正规医疗机构精神心理科/心理科就诊。
disclaimer.en: This report is generated from self-reported data and is for self-exploration and mental health screening only. It is not a medical diagnosis. If you feel significant distress, please seek professional care promptly.

crisis_banner.zh-CN: 检测到您当前承受着极大的心理痛苦。请记住，您并不孤单。优先求助专业力量是勇敢的表现。
crisis_banner.en: We detected severe psychological distress. You are not alone. Seeking professional support first is a courageous and recommended step.

privacy_notice.zh-CN: 测评答案会以脱敏与最小化原则处理，用于生成报告与质量监控。
privacy_notice.en: Responses are handled under data minimization and de-identification principles for report generation and quality monitoring.

M1.title: 情绪频率探测
M1.guidance: 请回想在过去的两周（14天）里，您有多常受到以下问题的困扰？

M2.title: 近期压力与心理韧性
M2.guidance: 在过去的一个月里，您对生活节奏、挫折与压力的真实感受是？

M3.title: 完美主义与家庭标准
M3.guidance: 抛开近期的情绪，请根据您从小到大的一贯性格或成长经历进行评价。

M4.title: 强迫习惯与功能受损
M4.guidance: 最后，请评估在最近7天里，您是否有一些难以自控的特定思维或行为及其影响。

M1.title: Mood and Anxiety Frequency
M1.guidance: Please think about the past two weeks (14 days). How often have you been bothered by the following problems?

M2.title: Stress and Psychological Resilience
M2.guidance: Over the past month, how often have you felt or experienced the following?

M3.title: Perfectionism and Family Standards
M3.guidance: Setting aside recent mood, please rate each statement based on your long-term personality pattern or upbringing experience.

M4.title: Compulsive Symptoms and Functional Impairment
M4.guidance: Finally, please evaluate whether you have had hard-to-control thoughts or behaviors in the past 7 days, and how much they affected you.
